column4: hi there, I can't watch movies over smb in edgy eft, any ideas?
we are in the same boat
but no solution from gogole search :(
what video player are you using?
if you stream with vlc on the server machine, it should work fine
but it's kind of an awkward solution
Kraeloc:yep, it's just a windows machine with movies on it
Kraeloc:and I want to watch them over network
i think there is a way to fully mount a network share as a drive
Kraeloc:thanks anyway, seems no one else knows about it
